pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/neuro-inc/platform-client-python/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/neuro-inc/platform-client-python)# PrefaceWelcome to Python Neuro-SDK for https://neu.ro/.# Documentationhttps://neuro-sdk.readthedocs.io/en/latest/# InstallationInstall from PyPI:```shell$ pip install neuro-sdk```# ContributingFor OSX users install coreutils to properly interpret shell commands:```brew install coreutils```Before you begin, it is recommended to have clean virtual environment installed:```shell$ python -m venv .env$ source .env/bin/activate```Development flow:* Install dependencies: `make setup`* Reformat code: `make format`* Lint: `make lint`* Run tests: `make test`
